languages.text: Ловко использовав речи проповедников против них самих, слуги Вольного Торговца объявили пилигримаж и выставили слуг Чорда из колонии вместе с теми, кто слишком прислушивался к гостям. Пусть ищут новый дом.

Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.
languages.original_text: Ловко использовав речи проповедников против них самих, слуги Вольного Торговца объявили пилигримаж и выставили слуг Чорда из колонии вместе с теми, кто слишком прислушивался к гостям. Пусть ищут новый дом.

traits.locale_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage and ousted Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

languages.text: Usando astutamente las palabras de los predicadores en su contra, los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente anuncian el inicio de un peregrinaje, expulsando a los lacayos de Chorda y a cualquiera que estuviera demasiado dispuesto a escucharles. Estos últimos son libres de buscarse una nueva vida.
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Usando astutamente las palabras de los predicadores en su contra, los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente anuncian el inicio de un peregrinaje, expulsando a los lacayos de Chorda y a cualquiera que estuviera demasiado dispuesto a escucharles. Estos últimos son libres de buscarse una nueva vida.

languages.text: Utilisant habilement les propres mots des prêcheurs contre eux, les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ont annoncé que ces derniers appelaient à un grand pèlerinage. Ainsi, la planète est débarrassée non seulement des laquais de Chorda, mais aussi de ceux qui leur prêtaient une oreille trop attentive. Ils n'auront plus qu'à se trouver un nouveau foyer.
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Utilisant habilement les propres mots des prêcheurs contre eux, les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ont annoncé que ces derniers appelaient à un grand pèlerinage. Ainsi, la planète est débarrassée non seulement des laquais de Chorda, mais aussi de ceux qui leur prêtaient une oreille trop attentive. Ils n'auront plus qu'à se trouver un nouveau foyer.

languages.text: 行商浪人的仆人巧妙地以其人之道还治其人之身，宣布开始朝圣之旅，将库尔达的走狗和那些被轻易煽动的愚民通通赶出了殖民地。现在，他们可以去寻找自己理想的新家园了。
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的仆人巧妙地以其人之道还治其人之身，宣布开始朝圣之旅，将库尔达的走狗和那些被轻易煽动的愚民通通赶出了殖民地。现在，他们可以去寻找自己理想的新家园了。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーのしもべたちは、プリーチャーの言葉を巧みに利用し、巡礼の開始を宣言した。チョーダ家の配下を、その言葉を熱心に聞こうとする者たちとともに追放したのだ。後者は今、自由に新たな故郷を探している。
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーのしもべたちは、プリーチャーの言葉を巧みに利用し、巡礼の開始を宣言した。チョーダ家の配下を、その言葉を熱心に聞こうとする者たちとともに追放したのだ。後者は今、自由に新たな故郷を探している。

languages.text: Die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} setzen die Worte der Prediger gerissen gegen sie selbst ein und verkünden den Beginn einer Pilgerreise. So werden sie Chordas Lakaien aus und alle, die ihnen allzu begeistert an den Lippen hingen. Letztere dürfen sich nun ein neues Zuhause suchen.
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} setzen die Worte der Prediger gerissen gegen sie selbst ein und verkünden den Beginn einer Pilgerreise. So werden sie Chordas Lakaien aus und alle, die ihnen allzu begeistert an den Lippen hingen. Letztere dürfen sich nun ein neues Zuhause suchen.

languages.text: Vaizlerin sözlerini kurnazlıkla kendilerine karşı kullanan Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârları, hac yolculuğunu ilan ederek Chorda'nın yalakalarını onlara kulak asanlarla birlikte alt etti. Bu kimselerin artık kendilerine yeni bir yuva bulması gerekecek.
languages.original_text: Shrewdly using the preachers' words against them, the Rogue Trader's servants announced the start of a pilgrimage, ousting Chorda's lackeys along with anyone who had been too eager to listen to them. The latter are now free to look for a new home.
